message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with optimization problems in machine learning, specifically hyperparameter optimization. It introduces a non-stochastic best-arm identification problem and proposes an algorithm to solve it. The paper also leverages the iterative nature of standard machine learning algorithms to cast hyperparameter optimization as an instance of non-stochastic best-arm identification. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Additionally, since the paper deals with optimization problems, cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, since the paper evaluates its proposed algorithm on image classification tasks, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is also a possible sub-category.
